title: AJ Style Royal Lamp Black
body: Designed by Arne Jacobsen in 1957, the AJ Style Royal Lamp was created for the bar and restaurant of the SAS Royal Hotel in Copenhagen. TheÂ Mobelaris style of AJ Style Royal Lamp is one of the products designed by Jacobsen for the hotel to achieve design icon status. It was designed to suspended high up and is 100% glare-free thanks to the clouded glass disk the light is directed towards the direction it is needed without the blinding effect. Popular choice for homes, bar, hotels and businesses all over the world. A very impressive classic design.
